plot: Sometimes it's best to just let things happen. Pimeää vasten is a film about painlessness. It wants to believe that when certain conditions are met, human life can be painless, voluntary and thus happy.
title: Pimeää vasten
plot_es: Sometimes it's best to just let things happen. Pimeää vasten is a film about painlessness. It wants to believe that when certain conditions are met, human life can be painless, voluntary and thus happy.
plot_en: Sometimes it's best to just let things happen. Pimeää vasten is a film about painlessness. It wants to believe that when certain conditions are met, human life can be painless, voluntary and thus happy.

produce.name: Tampere Polytechnic School of Art and Media
